Talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>You can't fool me, Cece. You've loved
simple, plain things forever, including
the vegetables of Hateno Village!
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>No, Reede. It is I who should be ashamed.
My childish pride would not allow me to
admit the truth.
Talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>I know for a fact that you hide in the silo
at night to snack on vegetables!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Everything's ready! It's time to get the
election for village mayor started!
Talk1059:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You think there's something there you
can use to get the youth to care about
vegetable farming.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Or it would be, anyway, if not for the rain.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We'll start as soon as the rain lets up,
so come see me then!
Talk1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It should have made me happy that you
came in and livened up the village.
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Hehe, There's nothing wrong with asking
if you can help, you know.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Nice day for an election, don't you think?
Everyone's gathering in the plaza!
Talk1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The trends and style I made my name on
are built on the foundation of traditional
culture that our forebears worked for.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And now, without further ado, let's have
each of our candidates for mayor say a
few words!
Talk1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd be a fool to pretend you're not the
reason our village is flourishing. I don't
want to deny you your due.
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sophie and Clavia told me what you did
on our behalf.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to you, Hateno Village is thriving
once more.<sp:0:4:0>We ought to reward such fine work, hmm?
Come to Ventest Clothing when you have
a moment.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'd love to get this election started,
but it's raining too hard right now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>We'll start as soon as the rain lets up,
so come see me then!
Talk1063:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We've come to a decision!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The best way to keep Hateno Village
vibrant is to work together to combine
traditional culture with new ideas!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now where were we? <sp:5:0:0>Right! It's time
to get the election for village mayor
underway!
Talk1064:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>At least it will once there's room for you
to hold it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>This is your reward for a very noble effort!
I can't let you leave empty-handed.<sp:0:4:0>Ditch something unfashionable, and come
back to me when you're ready.
Talk1065:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you prepared to receive the
<clr:0000>Cece hat<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>My perfect hat is unsuitable for anyone
else to wear.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>And besides, let's not pretend it won't
look absolutely dashing on you.
Talk1066:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My plan is to strengthen our community
with new local specialties, starting with
our brand-new Hateno cheese!
Talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Nonsense! It's trends that shape the
world, not the other way around.
Talk1067:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Vegetables don't make the world go
round. It's glamour that rakes in the cash!
Talk1068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Tidy, hm? <sp:5:0:0>I shall reinvent myself and
open Ventest Clothing anew!<sp:0:4:0>Sophie! <sp:5:1:0>There's work to be done, sister!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am the world-renowned Cece, Hyrule's
premier fashion designer. But you knew
that, of course!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Together, we can turn this backwater
village into Hyrule's go-to destination
for all things stylish.
Talk1069:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>As for myself... <sp:5:1:0>I've had a long think about
where to take my brand from here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>To begin with, I'll study my <clr:0000>collection of
unique goods<clr:ffff> designed by our forebears.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>See me if you happen to <clr:0000>part ways with
precious apparel<clr:ffff> that's too rare to be
purchased.<sp:0:4:0>I might have something in my collection
that can serve as a guide!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Fashion comes and goes! Your style is
trendy now, but it'll be over soon, and
then where will we be?!
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Did I hear you say you're working on new
vegetables to attract the youth of today?
That sounds like a Cece-worthy endeavor.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wish it wasn't so cloudy, but we should
be OK. Everyone gather in the plaza!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Both of you are just arguing for more of
what you likeâ€”not what's best for Hateno!
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Moi?! <sp:5:0:0>Wh...<sp:5:0:0>wherever did you get such
a curious notion?
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I knew, of course, that you'd been in
cahoots with Sophie.<sp:0:4:0>But I never dreamed you'd also been
conspiring with Clavia!<sp:0:4:0>Still and all, we can call that election
a success.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you remember what we discussed
when you first came here?
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now, put on that <clr:0000>Cece hat <clr:ffff>and lord it
over the whole world!
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's a little late to begin now. <sp:5:0:0>Let's try
this again <clr:0000>during the daytime on a
sunny day<clr:ffff>!
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd like to start the election, but...it's kind
of late now.<sp:0:4:0>Let's try this again <clr:0000>during the daytime on
a sunny day<clr:ffff>!
Talk1051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>This <clr:0000>Cece hat <clr:ffff>is the latest masterpiece
from the Cece collection!<sp:0:4:0>See those luxurious curves...the avant-
garde colorway...<sp:0:4:0>Everything about that hat is perfect.
And so I've been saving it to bequeath
to the perfect model.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And you, Reede! Your secret's out too.
I know why you've been secretly studying
Cece's designs in the shed.
Talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you grasp yet what I'm getting at?<sp:0:4:0>It's you that I want to model my <clr:0000>Cece hat<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You, who saved not just Hateno Village,
but also me and Reede.<sp:0:4:0>My perfect hat is unsuitable for anyone
else to wear.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>And besides, let's not pretend it won't
look absolutely dashing on you.
Talk1024: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Now who went and told you that?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I... <sp:5:0:0>I believe that the heart of our village
is its pastoral culture.<sp:0:4:0>We've built a close-knit, self-sufficient
lifestyle here in Hateno, and I don't want
to see us lose that.
Talk1055:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And nobody knows glamour like
me, darlings!
